item.title: Treating Water With Electricity
item.description:
Treating Water With Electricity

Electrocoagulation (EC), the passing of electrical current through water, has proven very effective in the removal of contaminants from water.  EC systems have been in existence for over 100 years, using a variety of anode and cathode geometries, including plates, balls, fluidized bed spheres, wire mesh, rods, and tubes.

item.title: About Us
item.description:
About Us

Athena Global Energy Solutions (AGES) is a global leader in energy, environmental, and humanitarian technology solutions.  AGES partners with numerous technology companies to integrate individual technologies into complete, sustainable solutions to enrich the lives of people and communities worldwide.
